page.title: 18Farm Shop, Buckham Hill.
page.content: We initially set out to produce food for our own consumption but found that we had an excess which we were able to sell 'at our door'. We realised that there was a demand for{organic}produce and the business expanded. In April '84 we converted an out-building into a shop. We can expect{600-700}custom- ers a week in Summer but fewer in the Winter as people are less prepared to travel out into the country. Fridays & Saturdays are busiest when we have 4 or 5 people working in the shop. All meat produce comes from{local {farms}or our own: beef,pork & bacon, lamb,veal,guinea fowl & geese. Dairy produce includes: unpasteurised milk & cream & a wide range of cheeses. We supply some vegetables, others come from local growers or from Brighton Market. We process the milk, cream, pigs & guinea fowl.
